new materials.sentence: Recently in Advanced Science, Liang and colleagues reported the successful realization of ultra-pure red emission with Sn-based perovskites.

experimental methodology.sentence: The authors chose the Sn-based perovskites with natural quantum well structure as active layers for light emission.

models.sentence: Therefore, the HPO (HPA) was introduced into Sn precursors as a mild reducing agent with good coordinating ability with Sn intermediates.
